name: Curandero
description:
You are the village's grand Healer, a master gardener, a renown potion brewer, and the only one who can keep this town alive! Pick bushes from the forest to gather seeds, plant them in your garden, and use the ingredients to brew magical healing potions to help the villager's in need.
A relaxing and positive game where your biggest challenges are figuring what ingredients to mix, which potions heal what ailments, and doing this quick enough before your patients leave.
